alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 2:34PM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. The Upper Weiser Basin and Baker County valleys will see additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches through Saturday. In the West Central and Boise Mountains additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in the valleys with 10 to 20 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central Idaho and northeast Oregon. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a break in the snow Friday afternoon through Saturday morning before more snow arrives on Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
